mapper.insert: insert into course (name, coach_id, capacity, time_slot_id, room_number, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{coach_id}, #{capacity}, #{time_slot_id}, #{room_number}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{description});
mapper.select: SELECT `course`.`id`,`course`.`name` as `course_name`,`coach`.`name` as `coach_name`,`course`.`start_date`,`course`.`end_date`, `course`.`time_slot_id`,`coach`.`id` as `coach_id` FROM `fitnesstest`.`course`,`fitnesstest`.`coach` where `course`.`coach_id` = `coach`.`id` AND `course`.`state`='正在上课';
mapper.update: update course set state = '已结课' where end_date < now() and state = '正在上课';
update course set state = '正在上课' where start_date <= now() and state = '即将开课';
mapper.select: select * from course where course.id in (select course_id from take_course where member_id = #{id})
